<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Freed Slave of Absalom](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=55)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

As a recently freed slave in Absalom, you belong to a new, close-knit social class at the heart of the city’s most important trades.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Absalom Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Streetwise](/Feats.aspx?ID=846) skill feat.
name: Freed Slave of Absalom
